name: PassFields
desc: An object that represents the groups of fields that display information on the front and back of a pass.

items.name: auxiliaryFields
items.desc: An object that represents the fields that display additional information on the front of a pass.

items.name: backFields
items.desc: An object that represents the fields that display information on the back of a pass.

items.name: headerFields
items.desc: An object that represents the fields that display information at the top of a pass.

items.name: primaryFields
items.desc: An object that represents the fields that display the most important information on a pass.

items.name: secondaryFields
items.desc: An object that represents the fields that display supporting information on the front of a pass.
